amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 118-7 to revise the disciplinary action consisting of removal, reduction in grade, debarment from federal employment for a period not to exceed 10 years, suspension, or reprimand.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Ogles.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
